snippet.title: DEATH TRIALS - Trailer FREE Indie Horror Game (Windows/Mac/Linux)
snippet.description:
***Buy the Director's Cut version on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2128340/Death_Trials_Directors_Cut/

***Older free version on Itch.io! https://made-in-america-media.itch.io/death-trials-v13

DEATH TRIALS is a disturbing horror game from Made in America Media. It is an unsettling story about kidnapping, scientific trials gone wrong, and a dark group of cultists burying all of their research.

You wake up in total darkness in a rusty metal cage. After you escape it, you notice the room you're in smells like rotten flesh and death. In this labyrinth of corpses and blood, you must find a way to escape... before they come for you.

Enter the world of DEATH TRIALS and face horrors buried within the halls of this God forsaken testing facility. Seek out the last remaining inhabitants and witness the atrocities that were meant to be hidden away forever. But be careful, danger lurks in every corner... the screams of things that used to be people can be heard in the distance... will you run and hide, or fight to escape?

ABOUT THE CREATORS:  We're a beginning game development studio, and this is our first game. If there's any bugs, please let us know so we can try to patch them. We will release the Mac and Linux versions eventually! We hope you enjoy the game!
